info.description: Fast, beautiful and fun way to share your life with friends through a series of pictures.
info.title: Instagram

get.description: Search for a location by name and geographic coordinate.

parameters.description: Latitude of the center search coordinate. If used, lng is required.
parameters.name: lat

parameters.description: Longitude of the center search coordinate. If used, lat is required.
parameters.name: lng

parameters.description: Returns a location mapped off of a foursquare v1 api location id. If used, you are not required to use lat and lng. Note that this method is deprecated; you should use the new foursquare IDs with V2 of their API.
parameters.name: foursquare_id

parameters.description: Returns a location mapped off of a foursquare v2 api location id. If used, you are not required to use lat and lng.
parameters.name: foursquare_v2_id

parameters.description: Search distance, in meters. Default is 1km (distance=1000), max distance is 5km (5000)
parameters.name: distance

get.description: Get information about a location.

parameters.description: The ID of the location to reference.
parameters.name: location-id

get.description: Get a list of recent media objects from a given location.

parameters.description: Return media after this max_id
parameters.name: max_id

parameters.description: Return media before this min_id
parameters.name: min_id

parameters.description: Return media after this UNIX timestamp
parameters.name: min_timestamp

parameters.description: Return media before this UNIX timestamp
parameters.name: max_timestamp

parameters.description: The ID of the location to reference.
parameters.name: location-id

get.description: Get a list of what media is most popular at the moment.
Get information about a media object.

parameters.description: Latitude of the center search coordinate. If used, lng is required.
parameters.name: lat

parameters.description: Longitude of the center search coordinate. If used, lat is required.
parameters.name: lng

parameters.description: A unix timestamp. All media returned will be taken earlier than this timestamp.
parameters.name: max_timestamp

parameters.description: A unix timestamp. All media returned will be taken later than this timestamp.
parameters.name: min_timestamp

parameters.description: Search distance, in meters. Default is 1km (distance=1000), max distance is 5km (5000)
parameters.name: distance

get.description: Get information about a media object.

parameters.description: The ID of the media object to reference.
parameters.name: id

get.description: Get a full list of comments on a media. Required scope: comments

parameters.description: The ID of the media object to reference.
parameters.name: media-id

post.description: Create a comment on a media. Required scope: comments

delete.description: Remove a comment either on the authenticated user's media or authored by the authenticated user. Required scope: comments

parameters.description: The ID of the media object to reference.
parameters.name: media-id

parameters.description: The ID of the comment to delete.
parameters.name: comment-id

delete.description: Remove a like on this media by the currently authenticated user. Required scope: likes

get.description: Get a list of users who have liked this media. Required scope: likes

parameters.description: The ID of the media object to reference.
parameters.name: media-id

post.description: Set a like on this media by the currently authenticated user. Required scope: likes

delete.description: Deletes a subscription by object type or ID.

parameters.description: The ID of the subscription you want to delete. Either this or "object" is required.
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: The object type of the subscription you want to delete, or "all" to clear all subscriptions.
parameters.name: object

parameters.description: Client ID of your application.
parameters.name: client_id

parameters.description: Client secret of your application.
parameters.name: client_secret

get.description: Returns your current subscriptions.

parameters.description: Client ID of your application.
parameters.name: client_id

parameters.description: Client secret of your application.
parameters.name: client_secret

post.description: Creates a subscription to receive notifications when a new photos are posted in an arbitrary geographical location as defined by a center point and radius.

parameters.description: Client ID of your application.
parameters.name: client_id

parameters.description: Client secret of your application.
parameters.name: client_secret

get.description: Search for tags by name.

parameters.description: Valid tag name without a leading #. (eg. snow, nofilter)
parameters.name: q

get.description: Get information about a tag object.

parameters.description: The name of the tag to reference.
parameters.name: tag-name

get.description: Get a list of recently tagged media.

parameters.description: Return media after this max_id
parameters.name: max_id

parameters.description: Return media before this min_id
parameters.name: min_id

parameters.description: The name of the tag to reference.
parameters.name: tag-name

get.description: Search for a user by name.

parameters.description: A query string.
parameters.name: q

parameters.description: Number of users to return
parameters.name: count

get.description: See the authenticated user's feed.

parameters.description: Return media earlier than this max_id
parameters.name: max_id

parameters.description: Return media later than this min_id
parameters.name: min_id

parameters.description: Count of media to return
parameters.name: count

get.description: See the authenticated user's list of media they've liked.

parameters.description: Return media liked before this id
parameters.name: max_like_id

parameters.description: Count of media to return
parameters.name: count

get.description: List the users who have requested this user's permission to follow. Required scope: relationships
Get basic information about a user.

parameters.description: The ID of the user whose information to retrieve, or "self" to reference the currently logged-in user.
parameters.name: user-id

get.description: Get the list of users this user is followed by. Required scope: relationships

parameters.description: The ID of the user to reference.
parameters.name: user-id

get.description: Get the list of users this user follows. Required scope: relationships

parameters.description: The ID of the user to reference.
parameters.name: user-id

get.description: Get the most recent media published by a user.

parameters.description: Return media earlier than this max_id
parameters.name: max_id

parameters.description: Return media later than this min_id
parameters.name: min_id

parameters.description: Count of media to return
parameters.name: count

parameters.description: Return media after this UNIX timestamp
parameters.name: min_timestamp

parameters.description: Return media before this UNIX timestamp
parameters.name: max_timestamp

parameters.description: The ID of the user whose recent media to retrieve.
parameters.name: user-id

parameters.description: The ID of the user to reference.
parameters.name: user-id

post.description: Modify the relationship between the current user and the target user. Required scope: relationships
